The name java was inspired by a coffee
Java can be used for mobile,web,desktop,games,database and more
Java is an object oriented programming language

The name python was inspired by a comedy series
Python can be used for web servers,mathematics,scripting and more
Python uses indentation to indicate a block of code
Comments in python can be # or multiline string
Python collections include List, Tuple,Set,Dictionary
Kotlin is concise, safe, interoperable and friendly
kotlin can be used for mobile,data science,web and more
An entry point of a kotlin application is the main function
You can declare variable with var and val
Kotlin is aimed at eliminating Null pointer exceptions
